name: Gold Pax Stablecoin (ETH)
info: Paxos Standard Gold (PAXG) is a digital asset where one token is backed by one fine troy ounce (t oz) of a 400 oz London Good Delivery gold bar, stored in Brinkâ€™s gold vaults. Anyone who owns PAXG owns the underlying physical gold, held in custody by Paxos Trust Company.
